nl.esciencecenter.xenon.credentials

Interface Credentials


  • public interface Credentials
    Credentials represents the credentials interface of Xenon. This interface contains various methods for creating and closing credentials.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rob van Nieuwpoort

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close(Credential credential)
      Close a Credential
      Credential getDefaultCredential(String scheme)
      Creates a default credential for the given scheme.
      boolean isOpen(Credential credential)
      Test if a Credential is open.
      Credential newCertificateCredential(String scheme, String certfile, String username, char[] password, Map<String,String> properties)
      Constructs a certificate Credential.
      Credential newPasswordCredential(String scheme, String username, char[] password, Map<String,String> properties)
      Constructs a password credential.

    • Method Detail

      • newCertificateCredential

        Credential newCertificateCredential(String scheme,
                                  String certfile,
                                  String username,
                                  char[] password,
                                  Map<String,String> properties)
                                    throws XenonException
        Constructs a certificate Credential. A certificate Credential is created out of a certificate file (containing the certificate), a user name, and (optionally) a password needed to access the credential.
        Parameters:
        scheme - the scheme for which to create a credential.
        certfile - the certificate file (for example userkey.pem or id_dsa).
        username - the user name.
        password - the password or pass phrase belonging to the certificate.
        properties - (optional) properties used to configure the credential.
        Returns:
        the Credential.
        Throws:
        UnknownPropertyException - If an unknown property was passed.
        InvalidPropertyException - If a known property was passed with an illegal value.
        CertificateNotFoundException - If the certificate file could not be found.
        XenonException - If the Credential could not be created.

      • newPasswordCredential

        Credential newPasswordCredential(String scheme,
                               String username,
                               char[] password,
                               Map<String,String> properties)
                                 throws XenonException
        Constructs a password credential. A password Credential consists of a user name and a password.
        Parameters:
        scheme - the scheme for which to create a credential.
        username - the user name.
        password - the password.
        properties - (optional) properties used to configure the credential.
        Returns:
        the Credential.
        Throws:
        UnknownPropertyException - If an unknown property was passed.
        InvalidPropertyException - If a known property was passed with an illegal value.
        XenonException - If the Credential could not be created.

      • getDefaultCredential

        Credential getDefaultCredential(String scheme)
                                throws XenonException
        Creates a default credential for the given scheme. It depends on the scheme if a default credential can be created.
        Parameters:
        scheme - the scheme for which to create a certificate.
        Returns:
        the Credential.
        Throws:
        UnknownPropertyException - If an unknown property was passed.
        InvalidPropertyException - If a known property was passed with an illegal value.
        XenonException - If the Credential could not be created.

      • close

        void close(Credential credential)
           throws XenonException
        Close a Credential
        Parameters:
        credential - the Credential to close.
        Throws:
        XenonException - If the Credential failed to close.

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen(Credential credential)
               throws XenonException
        Test if a Credential is open.
        Parameters:
        credential - the Credential to test.
        Throws:
        XenonException - If the test failed.
